definitions.definition: A game , played on a device with a sloping base , in which the player operates a spring-loaded plunger to shoot a ball , between obstacles , and attempts to hit targets and score points .
A situation where a ball is frantically kicked between many players.

main_definition: ( games ) A game , played on a device with a sloping base , in which the player operates a spring-loaded plunger to shoot a ball , between obstacles , and attempts to hit targets and score points .
secondary_definitions: ( figuratively , soccer ) A situation where a ball is frantically kicked between many players.
